top_comments.comment: Are you up for the challenge? I am demonstrating the stretches at a beginner level in this video but if it’s too easy you can go deeper into them 💙

Hello I am 10 yrs old from India🇮🇳 and I know that you are so kind and sweet I wish I could meet u and ur so flexible and ur room is gorgeous I love it can I get a heart❤💖💕 please 🙏 how do I get a stretch band I can't get it anywhere

Hi Anna! I did a lot of your stretching challenges in the past, especially in 2020. But then I didn’t for so long, so now my goal for the summer (Southern Hemisphere here, so our Christmas season is in summer) is to get back into stretching with your vid’s, starting with this this callenge 🌈🌈❤️❤️ you are so inspiring, I find your channel so fun
